sections.heading: Power of Eminent Domain in Internal Improvement or Public Utility Corporations
sections.text:
Section 10-5-1

Power of Eminent Domain in Internal Improvement or Public Utility Corporations.

All provisions of Title 10 have been repealed or transferred to Title 10A, effective January 1, 2011.

(Code 1907, §3482; Code 1923, §7016; Code 1940, T. 10, §71; Acts 1973, No. 1063, p. 1777, §1.)
